mapper.select: select token,lastupdate from TbToken where token=#{token} and timestampdiff(minute,lastupdate,now()) <= (select configValue from TbConfig where configKey='token.timeout')
mapper.update: update TbToken set lastupdate=now() where token=#{token}
mapper.delete: delete from TbToken where timestampdiff(minute,lastupdate,now()) > (select configValue from TbConfig where configKey='token.timeout')
